metadata.title: CVE-2020-16118 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In GNOME Balsa before 2.6.0, a malicious server operator or man in themiddle can trigger a NULL pointer dereference and client crash by sending aPREAUTH response to imap_mbox_connect in libbalsa/imap/imap-handle.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16118` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

balsa - 2.6.0-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: balsa package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.0-2ubuntu0.1').
